Looking at the current board, I have 'X' in cells 0 and 2. With 'O' in cell 1, my top row is blocked. Player 0 has 'O' in cells 1 and 4, creating a potential diagonal threat if they take cell 7. They also have 'O' in cells 4 and 8.
